engines: 3.0L V6 twin-turbo VR30DDTT Red Sport 400 (400 hp)
notes: Luxury sports sedan on FM platform shared with Nissan Skyline. VR30DDTT twin-turbo V6 features direct injection and variable valve timing. Red Sport 400 trim adds performance suspension and upgraded brakes. AWD system is ATTESA E-TS electronic torque split. Data sourced from Wikipedia Infiniti Q50 article, January 17, 2025 revision.

engines: 3.0L V6 twin-turbo VR30DDTT Red Sport 400 (400 hp)
notes: Luxury sports coupe sharing FM platform and powertrains with Q50 sedan. Features Direct Adaptive Steering (steer-by-wire system) and Dynamic Digital Suspension. Production ended in 2022. Data sourced from Wikipedia Infiniti Q60 article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Luxury coupe SUV featuring world's first production variable compression ratio engine (VC-Turbo). Engine compression ratio varies from 8:1 to 14:1 for performance and efficiency. Requires specialized diagnostic equipment for VC-Turbo system. Based on QX50 platform but with fastback roofline. Data sourced from Wikipedia Infiniti QX55 article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Three-row luxury crossover SUV on D platform shared with Nissan Pathfinder. Features ProPILOT Assist semi-autonomous driving system. VQ35DD engine features direct injection and variable valve timing. Replaces CVT with conventional 9-speed automatic transmission. Data sourced from Wikipedia Infiniti QX60 article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Full-size luxury SUV based on Nissan Armada/Patrol Y62 platform. Features hydraulic body motion control system and advanced 4WD system. VK56VD V8 features VVEL variable valve event and lift. Body-on-frame construction with independent rear suspension. Data sourced from Wikipedia Infiniti QX80 article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Redesigned full-size luxury SUV for 2025 model year. Expected to feature twin-turbo V6 replacing previous V8. Based on updated Nissan Patrol platform. Advanced driver assistance systems and updated interior technology. Data based on typical generation patterns - verify with Wikipedia Infiniti QX80 article when 2025 details are finalized.
